name: Mesaque Francisco
animation: A developer working on a desk
reach-me-out: You can reach me out in the following links:
biography: I am an experienced professional with a background since 2013, developing mobile and web applications for various companies. Passionate about agile methodologies and continuous process improvement, with a focus on mentoring junior developers through code reviews, constructive feedback, workshops, and pair programming. My expertise includes e-commerce solutions, single-page applications, and cloud-based CRM systems, consistently delivering value to the client with a strong collaborative spirit.
